attributes.action: Save Greenacre School from closing down.
attributes.background: Greenacre School in Banstead is closing down due to financial reasons meaning that all the year 7's to year 10's have no choice but to move to another school. There is currently under 10 people in year 8 and year 9. The year 11's have to find a new sixth form and will be split up.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the School's governing body.
